entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -13.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Whitehorse Airport 10:00 PM MST Monday 06 March 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -13.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.9 kPa falling
Visibility: 2.0 km
Humidity: 83 %
Wind Chill: -21
Dewpoint: -16.2°C
Wind: SSE 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending overnight then partly cloudy. Amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 06 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 12.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 06 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 26.
